post.text:
"It's a good thing Trump isn't in charge of the law in this country." -Hillary Clinton

"Yeah, because you'd be in jail." -Donald Trump

comment.author: David
comment.text: Threatening to jail a political opponent is TOTALLY acceptable for the leader of a democracy! I really value authoritarian impulses in potential presidents!

replies.author: Madison
replies.text: You break the law, you pay the price. Unlike Obama, that's supposed to be how it works.

replies.author: Michaela
replies.text: Well it's either that or you have a softy SOCIALIST in government who knows NOTHING about TAXES which is why I'm writing in Herman Cain #999

replies.author: Nathan
replies.text: He wants her in jail because she is a murderer, not because she is an opponent!

replies.author: Zane
replies.text: Lol this woman should have been in jail years ago my friend
